summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: LANDWIND Face Roller Massager, Y-Shape 3D Roller for Anti Aging, Face Lift, Anti Wrinkles, Skin Tightening (BA311) Review Date: 2020/07/22 Store: LANDWIND Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '5.8 x 1.8 x 1.6 inches; 12.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '791280480612'} Review Text: Overall, the item feels premium and has a nice weight to it. The materials used are pretty nice and make it have a great feel when you touch it. The kneading balls are well lubricated at the base making them rotate with ease and never clunks around.

Unfortunately, the unit I received does not have a functioning micro current. I put it under the sun for over a day and I couldn't feel a thing. The place where the solar chargers are almost look like just a dark plastic shell with nothing behind it. Either I received a defective unit or this product has a misleading aspect to it. In addition, it says the product comes with a velvet cloth which is something I never received inside my packaging.

It's really an average product for its price point but I had to knock another star because off missing items and a nonfunctioning microcurrent. Review Title: Average face roller with nonfunctioning microcurrent. Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: allez outdoor | Biodegradable Cleansing Cloths | Natural Plant-Based Face and Body Wipes | PH Balanced | Cactus Bloom and Chaparral Scent | 20ct Individually Wrapped Towelettes Review Date: 2020/07/26 Store: Allez Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Allez', 'Skin Type': 'Oily, Combination, Dry, Normal', 'Material Feature': 'Biodegradable Warning', 'Unit Count': '20.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '6.2 x 5.4 x 4.2 inches; 13.62 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'ABWPS001', 'UPC': '860000823210', 'Manufacturer': 'Allez Outdoor, LLC'} Review Text: Going on those long hiking trips you always dread the smell you carry on the way back and wish there was a convenient way to clean yourself up. With the Allez outdoor cleansing cloths I would say that your problems are solved!

The individually packed cloths fold out to a large size and retains moisture while being used heavily. I've used one wipe to clean my face, arms, legs, and back and there's still a good portion of moisture left on the wipe. In addition, with a nice scent to the wipe you feel really refreshed and clean after using them which is an amazing plus. I would say the best thing about these cloths compared to others is that they are well made and don't break apart after using them vigorously.

Overall, going hiking and staying outdoors this item should become an essential item in your pack! Review Title: Great cleansing cloth that is biodegradable! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 2oz / 60ml Glass Spray Bottles for DIY Refill, Essential Oils, Pillow Mists,Fine Mist Spray -3Packs Amber Color Review Date: 2020/08/10 Store: EagleKing Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'EagleKing', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '2 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '3', 'Special Feature': 'Mist Spray', 'Package Dimensions': '6.3 x 6.1 x 1.7 inches; 8.78 Ounces'} Review Text: For 5.99 these are some amazing quality spray bottles. I've been putting in hand sanitizer and essential oils in them and they're the perfect size. Good thick glass and a decent spray attachment makes the build quality on these pretty great.

if you're putting in liquids that can be damaged from UV light I would definitely suggest going for the amber clear color. Review Title: Great portable glass spray bottles! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Empty Brown Glass Spray Bottles2-Pack, Refillable 16 oz Containers for Essential Oils, Cleaning Products, Aromatherapy, Misting Plants, or Cooking - Reliable Sprayer with Mist and Stream Settings Review Date: 2020/09/15 Store: Cherry Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Cherry', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Package Dimensions': '9.09 x 6.46 x 3.35 inches; 4.94 Ounces', 'UPC': '791523234187'} Review Text: like this amber color, I used one bottle mixed with lemon essential oil to use in kitchen and family room, and another bottle mixed with lavender to use in laundry room. very neat and stylish to use. Review Title: stylish, amber color Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Empty Clear Glass Spray Bottles 2-PACK,Refillable 16 oz Containers for Essential Oils, Cleaning Products, Aromatherapy, Misting Plants, or Cooking - Reliable Sprayer with Mist Settings Review Date: 2020/11/05 Store: Cherry Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Cherry', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Special Feature': 'Mist Spray', 'Package Dimensions': '10 x 6.5 x 3.4 inches; 1.4 Pounds', 'UPC': '791523234156'} Review Text: Upon receiving the product I was really satisfied with the glass bottle used as it felt and looked high quality. I've been using this with a cleaning solution to clean my kitchen countertops and it worked perfectly misting just enough to clean a large area.

My one gripe with this product is that the glass is so high quality but the spray nozzle is made of not so great quality plastic that feels rather flimsy.

Other than the quality issue with the nozzle, everything works well and it does the job! Review Title: Wish the nozzle was higher quality. Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: HEMP BODY BUTTER FOR DRY SKIN - All Natural Healing Moisturizer, Eczema, Psoriasis, Anti-Aging Elasticity/Hydration Formula, Vegan, Cruelty Free Skin Care, 8oz. (Butt Naked-Tropical Scent)-Piper Cove Review Date: 2020/11/05 Store: Piper Cove Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Piper Cove', 'Item Form': 'Butter', 'Unit Count': '1.0 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.53 x 3.9 x 1.97 inches; 7.65 Ounces'} Review Text: The hemp body butter comes in a high quality case and is incredibly soft. I've been using this for around a month and I still have about half left and it seems like it is a great moisturizer as it soothes my dry skin. Not only does it hydrates but it also has an amazing smell that is absolutely addicting.

The only gripe that I have with the product is that it's rather thick and it will leave a sticky residue on your skin for quite a while. Review Title: Amazing smell and moisturizes Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Cutting Scissors Set 10 Pcs Professional Hairdressing Scissors Kit, Hair Cutting Scissors, Thinning Shears, Hair Razor Comb, Clips, Cape, Shears Kit for Home, Salon, Barber Review Date: 2020/11/08 Store: P.travel Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'P.travel', 'Included Components': 'Scissors', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Package Dimensions': '11.2 x 5.5 x 1.5 inches; 11.22 Ounces', 'UPC': '740646020214', 'Manufacturer': 'P.travel'} Review Text: Overall, I would say that out of this small hair cutting package only the scissors, thinning shears, and hair clips are decent quality. The scissors are made out of stainless steel but when using them you will notice that they wont cut as smoothly compared to more expensive higher quality scissors. The shears worked perfectly fine for me and they did the job well.

Everything else provided in the package is more like the 3 star hotel freebies that are cheap and poorly made. The cape is only good for a few times before it will most likely rip apart and the combs provided were bend on arrival. Review Title: Decent scissors and hair clips Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Travel Bottles Keychain, 1.7oz/50ml Portable Hand Sanitizer Bottles, Fine Mist Spray Keychain Bottles, Empty Leakproof Refillable Containers with Flip/Spray Cap Plastic Travel Bottles (5PC) Review Date: 2020/11/18 Store: XITENBAO Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'XITENBAO', 'Material': 'Silicone,Plastic', 'Capacity': '50 Milliliters, 1.7 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Special Feature': 'Portable, Mist Spray, Leakproof', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 7 x 2.5 inches; 3.99 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'klp-001', 'UPC': '192408404112'} Review Text: These refillable hand sanitizer bottles are so amazing. It makes it more cost efficient to just buy a big bottle of hand sanitizer and fill these small ones up. They come with a keychain so you can put it on your backpacks, purse, or keys so you never forget. They are also small that you can bring them with you. This has been really helpful during the pandemic so that I never forget hand sanitizer. Review Title: Perfect for the current pandemic Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

Do not repeat specific product names or details. It's really an average product for its price point but I had to knock another star because off missing items and a nonfunctioning microcurrent. raw_response:
**Preferences and Patterns Summary:**

- **Skincare and Hygiene Focus:** A notable preference for skincare and hygiene products. Frequently purchases items aimed at skin care (e.g., moisturizers, cleansing cloths, face massagers) and effective cleaning solutions.
  
- **Quality Sensitivity:** Shows an inclination towards quality, expressing satisfaction with well-made products, particularly those with premium materials (e.g., glass containers). Critiques products that do not meet expected quality standards.

- **Eco-conscious Choices:** Engages with environmentally friendly products, such as biodegradable cleansing wipes, indicating a preference for natural, sustainable options.

- **Functional and Portable Products:** Demonstrates a need for convenience with portable items (e.g., travel bottles) and multifunctional tools (e.g., spray bottles for essential oils and cleaning).

- **Outdoor Activity Readiness:** Values products that enhance outdoor experiences, such as hygiene during hiking trips.

- **DIY Enthusiasm:** Displays interest in DIY applications, evident in the purchase of refillable spray bottles for oils and sanitizers, indicating a practical approach to personal care and cleanliness.

- **Mixed Experience with Value:** Experiences mixed satisfaction regarding product value—some products rated highly for performance, while others noted low quality despite a good design or purpose.

target_interaction.title: Not effective at all
target_interaction.text: Overall, I would definitely not recommend this product until major changes have been made. There's definitely a market segment where there is a dire need for a product that can clean pet feet after a wet and dirty walk outside. I have two dogs and live in an area that is muddy and rainy all the time which results in super dirty patios and walkways when we get in the house. When I first saw this product i was actually very interested in first but upon using I was disappointed. The spin speed is in no way strong enough to get rid of dirt and gunk buildup between the dogs feet and just using the dog paw washer is incredibly messy with water spilling out all over the place. Honestly, after trying my best to use this product a few times i'd rather just carry my dogs into the bath tub and cleaning their paws myself.
target_interaction.title_meta: Dog Paw Washer Automatic Cleaner for Small and Medium dogs with Brush Pet Foot Cup Silicone
